name: visual-feedback-tool-extension
description: Visual feedback tool for Claude Code - click elements, adjust visually, send to AI

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:clean && npm run build:content && npm run build:background && npm run build:popup && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/src/content dist/src/background dist/icons
scripts.build:assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/content/styles.css dist/src/content/
